text: An unincorporated area is land that is not part of a town, city, or anything like a town. Often, there are not many people there. ==By country== ===The United States=== Often, unincorporated areas are governed by a bigger administration, such as a county. It is usually a place that some people live, but they are not any official city. Sometimes, they are called an unincorporated community. Some states have different rules for a place to become an official city. Category:Local government Category:Local government in the United States Category:Settlements
title: Unincorporated area
